episodes.synopsis: An ancient Chinese king's son accedes to the throne, but his new consort vies for power against her brother, who controls the king's militia.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: The emperor sentences a concubine who tried to poison him to commit suicide, but when she refuses, members of his court exploit the situation.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Consort Hua blames Zhen Huan for her miscarriage. Zhen Huan miscarries too. The emperor, furious that he was manipulated, makes amends.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: In Gan-Lu Temple, Zhen Huan falls for the emperor’s brother, but upsetting news causes her to return to the palace, knowing the reality she will face.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Ye Lan-Yi leads a nun to the palace to testify to Zhen Huan’s innocence; Wen Shi-Chu is ordered to castrate himself because of An Ling-Rong’s threat.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Zhen Huan is pregnant again but knows she is too weak to give birth, so she devises a plan to miscarry that will exact revenge upon the empress.
episodes.title: Episode 6

video.title: Zhen Huan Zhuan
video.synopsis: In 1722 China, betrayal, treachery and corruption torment the women in the imperial harem as they struggle to gain power and the Emperor's favor.
